title: Ominous Love
description: When sixteen-year-old Eloise's parents go away for two weeks, she’s thrilled. She’s looking forward to going to end-of-term parties with her friends. But strange sounds on the roof and outside her bedroom window at night have her too afraid to be alone in the rickety old house. Her boyfriend, Tom, isn't much help, he is only after one thing!Things take an interesting turn with a surprising meeting on the beach. Who is this gorgeous boy, and where did he come from? Eloise never believed in love at first sight, but when this dreamboat touches her, she’s consumed with a desire she’s never known before. Still afraid of being alone at night, she invites the handsome stranger to stay wit her while her parents are away. Though she melts in his arms when he kisses her, she wonders if she’s made a huge mistake, after all, someone is stalking her every move, but who?
author: Patricia Puddle
